00058           function SetCalenderEvent($cmd,$params){
00059                     //SC,oracleid,organisator,starttime,endtime,location,subject,umailid1:umailid2:umailid3,Res1:Res2:Res3,kurztext...
00060                     $timezone='(GMT+01.00) Amsterdam / Berlin / Bern / Rome / Stockholm / Vienna';
00061                     $msg=array(array('',''),array('',''));
00062                     $soapcomp='';
00063                     $soapm='';
00064                     $soap='';
00065                     $allday=0;
00066                     if($a['endtime']=='-1'){
00067                               $allday=1;
00068                               $a['endtime']=$a['starttime'];
00069                     }
00070 
00071                     $a['starttime']=$this->TimeToStamp($a['starttime'],0);
00072                     $a['endtime']=$this->TimeToStamp($a['endtime'],0);
00073                     $a['organisator']=$this->getemail($a['organisator']);
00074 
00075                     $soap.='<comp status="CONF" fb="B" class="PRI" transp="O" allDay="'.$allday.'" name="'.$a['subject'].'" loc="'.$a['location'].'">';

00083                     $soap.='<or a="'.$a['organisator'].'" d="'.$a['organisator_name'].'"/>';
00084

00087                               $name=$this->getcached_name($user,$ressource,1);
00088                               $email=$this->getemail($ressource);

00094                               $msg[0][0].=$name.' '.$email."\n";

00112 
00113                     }
00114

00129 <alarm action="DISPLAY">

00131 <rel m="10" related="START" neg="1"/>
00132 </trigger>
00133 </alarm>

00135

00138

00141

00170                     }

00181           function DeleteCalenderEvent($cmd,$params){
00182                     // $_GET['cmd'][1]='DCAL,947-946,mail1';
00183 
00184                     // DCAL,oracleid,organisator
00185                     $oracleid=$params[0];
00186                     $useremail=$this->getemail($params[1]);
00187 
00188                     //$zimbra_calid=getzimbraIdByOracleId($oracleid);
00189                     $zimbra_calid=$params[0];
00190 
00191                     //if($zimbra_calid==-1)return;
00192 
00193                     $soap=array('GetMsgRequest','zimbraMail','<m><id>'.$zimbra_calid.'</id></m>');
00194                     $ret=$this->dousersoap($useremail,$soap);
00195                     $m1=&$ret['soap:Body']['GetMsgResponse']['m']['inv']['comp'];
00196 
00197                     $msg=array(array('',''),array('',''));
00198                     $soape='';
00199 
00200                     foreach($m1['at'] as $empf){
00201                               $email=$this->getemail($empf['a']);
00202                               $soape.='<e a="'.$email.'" t="t"/>';
00203                               // Ressource...
00204                               if(isset($empf['cutype']) && $empf['cutype']=='RES'){
00205                                         $msg[0][0].=$empf['d'].' '.$email."\n";
00206                                         $msg[1][0].=$empf['d'].' '.$email."<br>\n";
00207                                         // Andere...
00208                               }else{
00209                                         $msg[0][0].=$empf['d'].' '.$email."\n";
00210                                         $msg[1][0].=$empf['d'].' '.$email."<br>\n";
00211                               }
00212                     }
00213 
00214                     $params=array(
00215 'organisator'=>$m1['or']['a'],
00216 'starttime'=>$this->TimeToStamp($m1['s']['d'],1),
00217 'endtime'=>$this->TimeToStamp($m1['e']['d'],1),
00218 'location'=>$m1['loc'],
00219 'kurztext'=>$m1['fr'],
00220 'subject'=>'su??',
00221 'organisator_name'=>$m1['or']['d']
00222 );
00223                     $soap='';
00224                     $soap.='<id>'.$zimbra_calid.'</id><comp>0</comp>';
00225                     $soap.='<m>';
00226                     $soap.='<su>Abgebrochen: Test</su>';
00227 
00228                     $soap.=$this->doCalText('Der folgende Termin wurde abgesagt:',$params,$msg);
00229                     $soap.='</m>';
00230 
00231                     $soap=array('CancelAppointmentRequest','zimbraMail',$soap);
00232 
00233                     $ret=$this->dousersoap($useremail,$soap);
00234 
00235           }

00247           function doCalText($text,$params,$msg){
00248 
00249                     // TXT MESSAGE
00250                     //---------------------------------------------------
00251                     $txt='
00252 
00253 '.$text.'
00254 
00255 Betreff: '.$params['subject'].'
00256 Organisator: '.$params['organisator_name'].' '.$params['organisator'].'
00257 
00258 Ort: '.$params['location'].'
00259 Ressourcen:'.$msg[0][0].'
00260 Uhrzeit: '.date('d.m.Y H:i',$params['starttime']).' - '.date('d.m.Y H:i',$params['endtime']).'
00261 
00262 Eingeladene Teilnehmer: '.$msg[0][1].'
00263 
00264 *~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
00265 
00266 Notiz
00267 '.$params['kurztext'].'
00268 
00269 ';
00270 
00271                     // HTML MESSAGE
00272                     //---------------------------------------------------
00273                     $html='
00274 '.$text.'
00275 
00276 Betreff: '.$params['subject'].'
00277 Organisator: '.$params['organisator_name'].' '.$params['organisator'].'
00278 
00279 Ort: '.$params['location'].'
00280 Ressourcen:'.$msg[1][0].'
00281 Uhrzeit: '.date('d.m.Y H:i',$params['starttime']).' - '.date('d.m.Y H:i',$params['endtime']).'
00282 
00283 Eingeladene Teilnehmer: '.$msg[1][1].'
00284 
00285 *~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
00286 
00287 Notiz
00288 '.$params['kurztext'].'
00289 
00290 ';
00291                     // Replace critical parts...
00292                     $replace=array(
00293                         'txt'=>array(array('<','>'),array('','')),
00294                         'html'=>array(array('<','>'),array('',''))
00295                     );
00296 
00297                     $txt=str_replace($replace['txt'][0],$replace['txt'][1],$txt);
00298                     $html=str_replace($replace['html'][0],$replace['html'][1],$html);
00299 
00300                     // Generate Soap
00301                     $soap='
00302 <mp ct="multipart/alternative">
00303 <mp ct="text/plain">
00304 <content>
00305 '.$txt.'
00306 </content>
00307 </mp>
00308 
00309 <mp ct="text/html">
00310 <content>
00311 '.$html.'
00312 </content>
00313 </mp>
00314 </mp>
00315 ';
00316 
00317                     return $soap;
00318           }

00327           function getAccountNameCached($user,$email,$ressource=false){
00328 
00329                     $usermail=$this->getemail($user);
00330                     $email=$this->getemail($email);
00331 
00332                     $cachegroup='cal_names';
00333                     $cname=$email;
00334 
00335                     $cache=$this->getCache($cachegroup,$cname);
00336                     if(!$cache){
00337 
00338                               //Ressource
00339                               if($ressource){
00340 
00341                                         $soap=array('SearchCalendarResourcesRequest','zimbraAccount','<attrs>displayName</attrs><searchFilter><cond attr="mail" op="has" value="'.$email.'" /></searchFilter>');
00342                                         //"attr":"displayName","op":"has","value":"anne"
00343                                         $ret=$this->dousersoap($usermail,$soap,true);
00344 
00345                                         if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['SearchCalendarResourcesResponse']['calresource']['displayName']['_content'])){
00346                                                   $cache=$ret['soap:Body']['SearchCalendarResourcesResponse']['calresource']['displayName']['_content'];
00347                                         }
00348                               // Normaler Name
00349                               }else{
00350                                         $userdetails=$this->getAccountbyName($email);
00351 
00352                                         if(isset($userdetails['displayName']['_content'])){
00353                                                   $cache=$userdetails['displayName']['_content'];
00354                                         }
00355 
00356                               }
00357                               //":{"_jsns":"urn:zimbraAccount","attrs":",mail,zimbraCalResLocationDisplayName,zimbraCalResContactEmail,description","searchFilter":{"conds":{"cond":[{"attr":"zimbraCalResType","op":"eq","value":"Equipment"}]}}}}}
00358 
00359                               $this->setCache($cachegroup,$cname,$cache);
00360                     }
00361                     return $cache;
00362           }
